title: Knock Out
description: He is all about pleasure. His. His woman’s. Incredible, unrelenting, mind-blowing pleasure.Heavy weight champion, Sebastian Delacroix knows how to handle pain. But when he has a woman beneath him, in his bed, her softness in his hands, it’s all about hot, unforgettable satisfaction and all the ways he can take it and give it. No one walks away from him…Except one woman: Renata Giordano. And now she’s back. Strong, sexy, irresistible Renata. This time, she will not escape. Sebastian is coming for her and he’ll fight as dirty as he has to. She will be his.
author: Mallery Malone
